MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ms.assetid: 0CBCEEA0-2B0E-44A1-A09A-F7A939632F3A title: Storyboarded animations description: Storyboarded animations are not just animations in the visual sense.

<Storyboard x:Name="myStoryboard"> <DoubleAnimation Storyboard.TargetName="MyAnimatedRectangle" Storyboard.TargetProperty="Opacity" From="1.0" To="0.0" Duration="0:0:1"/> </Storyboard> // a different area of the XAML <Rectangle x:Name="MyAnimatedRectangle" Width="300" Height="200" Fill="Blue"/>

<Page ...> <Page.Resources>
<Storyboard x:Name="myStoryboard"> <DoubleAnimation Storyboard.TargetName="MyAnimatedRectangle" Storyboard.TargetProperty="Opacity" From="1.0" To="0.0" Duration="0:0:1"/> </Storyboard> </Page.Resources>
<StackPanel> <Rectangle x:Name="MyAnimatedRectangle" Width="300" Height="200" Fill="Blue"/> </StackPanel> </Page>
